sentences.pinyin: wǒ shàng xià kàn le kàn。

sentences.simplifiedText: 我费尽心机从上到下检查这篇文章找错误。
sentences.traditionalText: 我費盡心機從上到下檢查這篇文章找錯誤。
sentences.pinyin: wǒ fèi jìn xīn jī cóng shàng dào xià jiǎn chá zhè piān wén zhāng zhǎo cuò wù。
sentences.translation: I painstakingly checked this article for mistakes from top to bottom.

sentences.simplifiedText: 这家公司的员工上下齐心协力。
sentences.traditionalText: 這家公司的員工上下齊心協力。
sentences.pinyin: Zhè jiā gōngsī de yuángōng shàngxià qíxīnxiélì.
sentences.translation: The employees of this company work together from top to bottom.

sentences.simplifiedText: 不管是上下级的关系，还是老少辈的交往，门当户对都是不能忽视的。
sentences.traditionalText: 不管是上下級的關係，還是老少輩的交往，門當戶對都是不能忽視的。
sentences.pinyin: Bùguǎn shì shàngxiàjí de guānxi, háishì lǎoshàobèi de jiāowǎng, méndānghùduì dōu shì bùnéng hūshì de.
sentences.translation: Whether it is the relationship between superiors and subordinates, or the interaction between the old and young, you can't ignore social status and family background.

sentences.pinyin: Wǒ zài zhōngguó shàng xià zhǎo tā.
sentences.translation: I have been looking for him all over China.

sentences.simplifiedText: 他上下努力寻找那个失踪的猫。
sentences.traditionalText: 他上下努力尋找那個失蹤的貓。
sentences.pinyin: Tā shàng xià nǔlì xúnzhǎo nàgè shīzōng de māo.
sentences.translation: He is searching high and low strenuously for that missing cat.
